name: Bana
description: '''Adriano Gonçalves''' (5 March 1932 – 13 July 2013), known by his stage name '''Bana''' and called the "[[Honorific nicknames in popular music|King of Morna]]", was a [[List of Cape Verdeans|Cape Verdean]] singer and performer of the [[Morna (music)|morna]] style, the plaintive, melodic lament which is a staple musical style of the country.
